summary: Just like \'Grand Healing\' Mod, but for \'Heal Other\'. Want to heal your companion from afar with the \'Heal Other\' spell? But forced to heal from a close range?? Here is your solution.
descriptionHtml:
[s]Want[/s] [u]Need[/u] to heal your companion[s]s[/s] from afar with the \'[b][color=ffe691]Heal Other[/color][/b]\' spell? But forced to heal from a close range?? Here is your solution. Now you can heal from a distance with the \'[b][color=ffe691]Heal Other[/color][/b]\' mod.

[b][color=ffe691][size=15]Heal Other Mod[/size][/color][/b]

_[b][color=5781bb]info[/color][/b]: Changes the range for \'Heal Other\'.

_[b][color=5781bb]install[/color][/b]: Drop the .esp into your main Skyrim directory.

_[b][color=5781bb]uninstall[/color][/b]: Delete the file from directory.

_[b][color=5781bb]done[/color][/b].

Check out the \'[b][color=ffe691][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=861]TRS Companions[/url][/color][/b]\' mod!

Check out the \'[b][color=ffe691][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=426]Grand Healing[/url][/color][/b]\' mod!
author: focker7
